description:
“I’m from the midwest,” Jayden said. “Everyone from the midwest is nice!”
And he was right... Jayden was extremely polite the entire time he was here.
“Will you do anything we ask?” I joked. “If we ask nicely?”
He laughed. I think he knew what I meant.
“Probably,” he said. “I've always had a problem with saying no!”
We were relaxing around the pool and Jayden was wearing next to nothing.
It didn’t take much to get him out of his clothes. He has a nice body and you could tell he was proud of it.
“I work pretty hard on it,” he said bashfully.
Jayden seems pretty open minded, so maybe he really will do anything we ask!
title: Jayden
